segments.text: Observing this, the kitchen has that homey feel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Upper cabinets open, cookie jar prominent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stretched up, hand in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's balancing on that shaky two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Plate in his other hand, trying to be careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's beside him, reaching for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look so eager, like little conspirators.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the sink's a waterfall, overflowing steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's ruining the cabinet doors below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's drying dishes, foot in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems lost in her routine, unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a calm garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes on both sides, everything tidy out there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This interior chaos is heartbreaking to see.
segments.speaker: PAR
